original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyanti.
“kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁gandh avaṇṇ akena ▁na hā y issanti ▁seyyathāpi ▁gihi ni yo ▁kām a bhog ini yo ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁ ass o su ṃ ▁kho ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁tesaṃ ▁manuss ānaṃ ▁ujjhāy antānaṃ ▁kh iy yant ānaṃ ▁vi pā c entā naṃ

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
“saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyantī”ti?
kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyissanti.
evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—

analyzed: ▁yā ▁pana ▁bhikkhunī ▁gandh avaṇṇ akena ▁na hā y eyya ▁pācittiy anti

original: nahāyati. Payoge dukkaṭaṁ, nahānapariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ▁na hāya ti ▁payog e ▁dukkaṭaṃ ▁na hā na pariyosān e ▁āpatti ▁pācittiy assa
